topics.body:
So, what do you guys think of Anime News Network? I think they're good when it comes to news and production of anime, but their other stuff are...less than good.

Also, for a site called *Anime* News Network, they sure have a lot of articles about video games. I understand if it relates to anime, but they had a review of Bloodborne of all things.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

topics.body:
*Oh yeah, it's my dogs' 2nd Birthday today! :D*

*Recent pics of them (btw, they're brother and sister):*
!http://i.imgur.com/CzmgqvK.jpg!
!http://i.imgur.com/LSVtO9D.jpg!
If anyone asks, their names are _Sparky_ (top picture, male) and _Ruby_ (bottom picture, female), and they're Cavalier King Charles Spaniels. We've had them ever since they were over a month old.

You know what's funny? _I've never really had pets before until we finally got these two..._
And now I'm glad we've got them.
